skillTree.localised_description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Together with Stormwing, Eltharion cuts through Ulthuan’s foes like a wind of blades as the mighty Griffon rakes and claws with savagery.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Steel that bites deeper than the flesh.
When no fixture presents itself, one must simply make their own.

effects.description:
Ability: "Unending Volley" for missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: These walls have stood since ages past, and they will not fall until this world crumbles into nothing!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Wall and Garrison buildings
	(all provinces)

Armour: +15 for all units when defending
	(Lord's army)

Construction time: -2 for Wall and Garrison buildings
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: No being is above suspicion, no motive shall remain hidden. No peace without war.

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Enemies hit by bombardment in melee combat

skillTree.localised_description: No dark corner of the world will serve to hide you from the Mistwalkers.
The Elves of Tor Yvresse contain a deep hatred, war has scarred their hearts and steeled their souls. Tor Yvresse will not fall again.

effects.description:
Replaces: "Martial Mastery and Martial Prowess"
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: The Lady of Mists is a patron of the hidden and the lost. Her presence is felt most strongly within the mists of Yvresse, where she is said to guide wanderers to safety.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -20% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -40% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +20% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +20% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Hand of Glory"

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tempest Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Arcane Unforging"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Fiery Convocation"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Fiery Convocation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Fiery Convocation Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

skillTree.localised_description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

skillTree.localised_description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

skillTree.localised_description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

skillTree.localised_description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

skillTree.localised_description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
“Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Pointy-ead'' is legendary among the Greenskins, who both fear and respect his martial prowess.

items.colour_text: This rune-encrusted longsword has been passed down through Eltharion’s family for generations, bestowing unto him the zeal of his forefathers.
The ceremonial crown of he who protects Yvresse’s ancient metropolis is an inspirational symbol of dogged determination.

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕Entities cannot die while ability is active

items.colour_text: This finely wrought medallion allows its wearer a measure of the original Warden's magical knowledge to aid in the guardianship of Yvresse.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hand of Glory"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hand of Glory Upgraded"
